We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AutoRegressiveIntegratedMovingAverage _arima;
// In Initialize()
_arima = ARIMA(symbol, arOrder, diffOrder, maOrder, period);

// In OnData()
if (_arima.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Is Ready", _arima.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Warm Up Period", _arima.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Ar Residual Error", _arima.ArResidualError);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Ma Residual Error", _arima.MaResidualError);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Current", _arima.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Name", _arima.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Samples", _arima.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.arima = self.ARIMA(symbol, arOrder, diffOrder, maOrder, period)

# In OnData()
if self.arima.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Is Ready", self.arima.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Warm Up Period", self.arima.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Ar Residual Error", self.arima.ArResidualError);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Ma Residual Error", self.arima.MaResidualError);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Current", self.arima.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Name", self.arima.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ARIMA Samples", self.arima.Samples);
